#summary 依申请公开
#labels free,cms,freecms,开源,免费,内容管理系统

= 依申请公开 =
<p>
	<span style="font-style: italic; font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">从FreeCMS 1.3 开始支持</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">1. </span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">转交申请公开</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">用户可以把申请公开转交给其他人办理，系统会记录此申请公开的转交记录</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">注意：同时只能转交一个申请公开。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124624_HQEE_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124624_HQEE_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">选择需要转交的申请公开，点击"转交"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124638_RWzt_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124638_RWzt_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">选择要转交的个人，点击"转交"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124653_0VRD_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124653_0VRD_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">2. </span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">办理申请公开</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124707_ziDv_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124707_ziDv_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">选择需要办理的申请公开，然后点击"办理按钮"。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">注意：同时只能办理一个申请公开。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124724_7pSd_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124724_7pSd_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">输入办理结果后，点击"办结"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">3. </span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">删除申请公开</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">选择需要删除的申请公开，然后点击"删除"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">提示:同时可以删除多个申请公开。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124744_Eryy_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124744_Eryy_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124753_hKIP_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0427/124753_hKIP_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">为了防止误操作，系统会提示用户是否删除，点击"确定"完成删除操作。</span></p>
